1:
Listen, Yahweh, and answer me,
\q for I am poor and oppressed.
\q
2:
Protect me, for I am loyal;
\q my God, save your servant who trusts in you.
3:
Be merciful to me, Lord,
\q for I cry out to you all day long.
\q
4:
Make your servant glad,
\q for to you, Lord, I pray.
5:
You, Lord, are good, and ready to forgive,
\q and you show great mercy to all those who cry out to you.
\q
7:
In the day of my trouble I call on you,
\q for you will answer me.
8:
There is no one who compares to you among the gods, Lord.
\q There are no deeds like your deeds.
\q
9:
All the nations that you have made will come and bow before you, Lord.
\q They will honor your name.
11:
Teach me your ways, Yahweh. Then I will walk in your truth.
\q Unite my heart to reverence you.
\q
12:
Lord my God, I will praise you with my whole heart;
\q I will glorify your name forever.
14:
God, the arrogant have risen up against me.
\q A gang of violent men seek my life.
\q They have no regard for you.
15:
But you, Lord, are a merciful and gracious God,
\q slow to anger, and abundant in covenant faithfulness and trustworthiness.
\q
17:
Show me a sign of your favor.
\q Then those who hate me will see it and be put to shame
\q because you, Yahweh, have helped me and comforted me.
